meanings.sent1: The multichambered heart pumps blood efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The multichambered seashell was beautifully intricate.
meanings.sent3: The multichambered birdhouse had rooms for all the feathered tenants.
meanings.sent4: The multichambered storage container kept each item neatly separated.
meanings.sent5: The multichambered flower displayed a stunning array of colors in each section.

meanings.sent1: The multichambered toolbox held all his tools neatly.

meanings.sent3: The multichambered desk organizer kept pens, pencils, and paper in order.

meanings.sent5: The multichambered backpack made it easy to find items quickly.
